title: COMPLYFirst Element-V
creator: Odellus Corporation
description: COMPLYFirst Element-V is a Windows desktop application for automated and manual web accessibility testing. COMPLYFirst Element-V includes a comprehensive set of tools and features that enable development and QA processes for accessibility. It includes unlimited scanning/verification of web pages.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
Section 508, <abbr title="United States">US</abbr> federal procurement standard
assists: Modifying the presentation of web pages
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
